snippet: The system packed sustained winds of almost 150 miles per hour and threatened to bring dangerous torrential rains to two of the most arid countries in the world.
abstract: Joint Typhoon Warning Center says Cyclone Chapala, heading towards Yemen and Oman coasts, has intensified to Category 4 hurricane, with sustained wind speeds and gusts of 150 to 180 miles per hour.
lead_paragraph: The system packed sustained winds of almost 150 miles per hour and threatened to bring dangerous torrential rains to two of the most arid countries in the world.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Yemen: Rare Cyclone Approaches
headline.main: Cyclone Chapala, Gathering Strength, Heads Toward Oman and Yemen
